body:
It's not a leak, that's only caused because the `.grad` is never detached and keeps accumulating the graphs of all iterations. Adding
```python
x.grad.detach_()
y.grad.detach_()
```
(or calling any `zero_grad()` function) frees the history and the memory usage stays constant.
